data.name: Mokoko X - Adult Patch
data.detailed_description: This DLC unlocks the censored features of the game. After installing the patch, you can strip the ladies and see them completely nude.
data.about_the_game: This DLC unlocks the censored features of the game. After installing the patch, you can strip the ladies and see them completely nude.
data.short_description: You can strip the ladies and see them nude with this patch.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or higher
  • Storage: 65 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 65 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.0 or above
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or higher
  • Storage: 65 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This content includes nudity and sexual references suitable only for mature audiences.
